overview: Viva Emptiness is the sixth full-length album by Katatonia, released in 2003 by Peaceville Records. Its main subjects are loneliness, social relations, crime, lying and depression. Viva Emptiness incorporates more of a rock style, with a strong but melodic doom metal sound influenced by progressive rock and alternative metal. The album was re-released in 2013, coinciding with the 10th anniversary of the album.
title: Katatonia Viva Emptiness Live
